name: Ragnar Lodbrok
description: You are this type of hero if you have a long beard, a Nordic name and are in command of many men.

name: Batman
description: You're tall and strong. When you're not fighting crime you're living the billionaire lifestyle, for example going on sailing holidays.

name: Ironman
description: You work with technology and understand the natural world. You're an expert in your field and might even have a PhD

name: Young Goku
description: You're a hero with great potential. You learn new things in just one week.
